name: Pizza Quality Control
description:
You have to check the pizza quality and make sure all the pizzas make it to the furnace in the best shape possible!

Instructions in first image.
You can pick up 2 items, one with left mouse button and second with right mouse button.

Made with Godot Engine 3.2.3, Pixelorama, Krita and beepbox.co in less than 48 hours total :)

Hope you enjoy!

(2/12)
